event.event_description: Diego provided an update on sharing the pricing breakdown with his legal team.
Bruce reassured Diego about holding the current pricing.
Follow-up meeting scheduled to check in on legal feedback.

AI_GENERATED_SUMMARY: The Slack thread initiated with Sales Rep Bruce Wayne welcoming prospect Diego. Diego provided an update on sharing the pricing breakdown with his legal team, expecting feedback soon. Bruce proactively offered support from his legal/revops team and reassured Diego about holding the current pricing. The conversation concluded with Bruce committing to follow up after Diego receives legal feedback, highlighting a collaborative and positive progression of the sales cycle.

RECOMMENDATIONS.Escalation_Triggers: If no agreement is reached in the next meeting
RECOMMENDATIONS.Deal_Acceleration_Tactics: Provide additional resources or case studies to support the proposal

Email_Draft.subject: Follow-up on Data360 Integration Proposal
Email_Draft.body:
Hi Diego,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to confirm our upcoming meeting on Friday to discuss the Data360 integration proposal further. Please let me know if there are any specific topics you would like to address.

Looking forward to our conversation.

Best,
Bruce

AI_GENERATED_FOLLOW_UP.Slack_Message: Hi Diego, just confirming our meeting on Friday regarding the Data360 integration proposal. Let me know if you have any specific questions!
